name: Applied Diegetics
description:
This game was originally created in Fall 2021 for a Game Tech I class.

Applied Diegetics is a 2D, match-2 tile puzzle game where the game systems themselves are the puzzle. To progress, you must match GAME ELEMENTS (left) to their associated VALUE (right) - these elements include the current turn, turns remaining, the time currently played, etc. Includes:

  • 30 different element types
  • A 6-level campaign 
  • An endless mode of progressively-challenging puzzles
  • More than one egg

Game created by Max Cohen

Original music by Victor Mujat
